sensory_systems.name: Advanced LiDAR & 3D Imaging
sensory_systems.description: High-resolution LiDAR scanners capable of 360-degree environmental mapping with centimeter-level accuracy. Includes time-of-flight and phase-shift LiDAR combined with multi-spectral imaging for object identification beyond simple color.
sensory_systems.specifications: Range: 200m - 500m, Resolution: <1cm, Frame Rate: 100Hz - 500Hz, Spectral Bandwidth: Visible-NIR (400-900nm), Dynamic Range: 100dB.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Absolute Position Error: < 5cm, Relative Position Error: < 1cm, Object Detection Accuracy: > 95% (for predefined object classes)

sensory_systems.name: Event Cameras
sensory_systems.description: Neuromorphic event cameras that capture changes in brightness rather than full frames, providing high temporal resolution and low latency. Ideal for detecting motion and sudden changes.
sensory_systems.specifications: Frame Rate: 1000Hz - 10000Hz, Dynamic Range: 80dB, Bit Depth: 12-16 bits, Latency: < 1ms.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Motion Detection Rate: > 98%, Latency: < 5ms, Change Detection Sensitivity: > 90% (adjustable threshold).

sensory_systems.name: Acoustic Mapping Systems
sensory_systems.description: Arrays of MEMS microphones combined with advanced signal processing to create 3D sound maps, detecting obstacles and identifying sounds related to network events.
sensory_systems.specifications: Frequency Range: 20Hz - 20kHz, Spatial Resolution: 10cm - 30cm, Sensitivity: -30dB - -60dB, Number of Sensors: 16-64.
sensory_systems.accuracy_metrics: Sound Source Localization Error: < 2m, Noise Floor Reduction: > 20dB, Object Identification Accuracy (based on sound): > 80% (limited by training data).

control_systems.name: Reinforcement Learning Controllers
control_systems.description: RL agents trained to dynamically manage SDN policies based on real-time network conditions and objectives. Includes robust adaptation to changing network topologies and traffic patterns.
control_systems.specifications: Convergence Time: < 10 seconds, Decision Latency: < 1ms, Learning Rate Adjustment: Adaptive control based on network stability.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Network Throughput Optimization: > 10%, Congestion Reduction: > 15%, Policy Change Success Rate: > 90%.

control_systems.name: Swarm Control Algorithms
control_systems.description: Decentralized control mechanisms inspired by biological swarms, allowing SDN devices to collaboratively optimize network performance without central authority.
control_systems.specifications: Communication Protocol: Lightweight message passing (e.g., DDS), Fault Tolerance: > 95%, Scalability: > 1000 nodes.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Network Stability: > 98%, Adaptive Routing Accuracy: > 90%, Response Time: < 10ms.

control_systems.name: Predictive Control Systems
control_systems.description: Utilizing time-series forecasting and machine learning to anticipate future network demands and proactively adjust SDN policies.
control_systems.specifications: Forecast Accuracy (Traffic Volume): > 90%, Prediction Horizon: 5-30 minutes, Model Update Frequency: 1-5 minutes.
control_systems.accuracy_metrics: Deviation from Actual Traffic: < 5%, Resource Allocation Efficiency: > 95%.

mechanical_systems.name: Micro-Robotic Deployers
mechanical_systems.description: Miniaturized robots capable of physically manipulating network devices (e.g., attaching sensors, replacing components).
mechanical_systems.specifications: Payload Capacity: < 1kg, Operating Range: < 10m, Mobility: Omnidirectional movement, Precision: < 1mm.
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Component Replacement Accuracy: > 98%, Device Positioning Accuracy: < 10cm.

mechanical_systems.name: Self-Healing Network Infrastructure Components
mechanical_systems.description: Network hardware (routers, switches) with integrated sensors and micro-robotics for automatic diagnostics and minor repairs.
mechanical_systems.specifications: Diagnostic Coverage: 90%+ (common failure modes), Repair Time: < 5 minutes (minor issues).
mechanical_systems.accuracy_metrics: Mean Time To Repair (MTTR): < 15 minutes, Failure Detection Rate: > 95%.

software_integration.name: Digital Twin Platform
software_integration.description: A continuously updated virtual representation of the network, synchronized with the physical network via sensor data and control signals.
software_integration.specifications: Data Synchronization Rate: 10Hz - 100Hz, Model Fidelity: > 95%, Simulation Accuracy: > 90%.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Simulation Accuracy (Network Performance): > 90%, Predictive Maintenance Accuracy: > 85%.

software_integration.name: AI-Powered SDN Controller
software_integration.description: A centralized controller built on advanced AI frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) capable of real-time decision-making, policy optimization, and anomaly detection.
software_integration.specifications: Latency: < 1ms, Computational Power: > 1000 FLOPS, Memory Capacity: > 1TB.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Network Throughput, Congestion Reduction, Anomaly Detection Accuracy: > 95%.

software_integration.name: Blockchain-Based Network Management
software_integration.description: Secure and transparent record-keeping of network events and policies, enabling automated trust and collaboration between network devices.
software_integration.specifications: Transaction Throughput: > 1000 TPS, Data Integrity: Immutable records.
software_integration.accuracy_metrics: Transaction Validation Accuracy: > 99%, Data Security: Resistance to tampering.

Focus on realistic technological advancements that could be achieved in the next 5-15 years. For each technology, include specific technical specifications and accuracy metrics where appropriate.
input.user_message:
Create a detailed overview of future technologies needed for full automation of: Software Defined Networking (SDN)

Format your response as a JSON object with these categories:
1. sensory_systems: Array of sensing technologies with descriptions and accuracy metrics
2. control_systems: Array of control mechanisms and their capabilities
3. mechanical_systems: Array of physical components and their specifications
4. software_integration: Array of software technologies needed to coordinate everything
5. timeline_estimate: Estimated years until these technologies could be realized
6. key_research_areas: Array of critical research domains that need breakthroughs

Please return ONLY valid JSON without any additional text, explanation, or code block formatting.
